comments.body: what is this file? Why does it copy tons of code. We can't do that.

in apiextensions-apiserver, we need a spec aggregator to 1. keep a {CRD GVK -> spec} mapping 2. merge the specs 3. serve the merged spec on openapi handler (note that it's the openapi handler of apiextensions-apiserver, not kube-aggregator)

so we will have two spec aggregators:
- one in kube-aggregator that keeps {1 aggregated apiserver -> N apiservices -> 1 spec} mapping
- one in apiextensions-apiserver that keeps {1 CRD GVK -> 1 spec} mapping

would like to share some code and have a common aggregator package (apiextensions-apiserver cannot import kube-aggregator directly)
